statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_plans;
SELECT plan_name, plan_price FROM satellite_communication_plans WHERE billing_frequency = 'Monthly';
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, plan_price FROM satellite_communication_plans WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_plans WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT subscriber_id, plan_name FROM satellite_communication_plans ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_plans WHERE plan_price > 1000;
SELECT plan_name, plan_price, billing_frequency FROM satellite_communication_plans WHERE billing_frequency LIKE 'Monthly%' ORDER BY plan_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_plans WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM satellite_communication_plans WHERE subscriber_id IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT billing_frequency FROM satellite_communication_plans ORDER BY billing_frequency ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscription_plans;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM subscription_plans WHERE price > 50;
SELECT subscriber_name, billing_amount FROM billing_information ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE subscriber_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT plan_name, price, billing_amount FROM subscription_plans JOIN billing_information ON subscription_plans.plan_id = billing_information.plan_id;
SELECT * FROM subscription_plans WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY plan_name DESC;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM subscription_plans WHERE plan_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND price < 100 ORDER BY plan_name ASC;
SELECT subscriber_name, billing_amount FROM billing_information WHERE billing_amount >= 50 ORDER BY subscriber_name ASC, billing_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscription_plans WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC, plan_name DESC;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM subscription_plans WHERE plan_name LIKE '%basic%' OR plan_name LIKE '%premium%' ORDER BY price DESC, plan_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Satellite_Communication_Subscription_Plans;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM Satellite_Communication_Subscription_Plans ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM Satellite_Communication_Subscription_Plans WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM Billing_Information JOIN Satellite_Communication_Subscription_Plans ON Billing_Information.plan_id = Satellite_Communication_Subscription_Plans.plan_id;
SELECT customer_name, amount_due FROM Billing_Information WHERE amount_due < 50 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Satellite_Communication_Subscription_Plans;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM Satellite_Communication_Subscription_Plans WHERE price > 50;
SELECT billing_id, amount_due, customer_name FROM Billing_Information ORDER BY amount_due DESC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM Satellite_Communication_Subscription_Plans WHERE plan_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT plan_id, plan_name, price FROM Satellite_Communication_Subscription_Plans JOIN Billing_Information ON Satellite_Communication_Subscription_Plans.plan_id = Billing_Information.plan_id WHERE amount_due > price;
SELECT * FROM subscription_plans;
SELECT name, price FROM subscription_plans ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers WHERE status='active';
SELECT plan_id, activation_date FROM subscribers WHERE activation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT subscriber_id, amount FROM billing_information WHERE amount >= 100.00 ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscription_plans WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT subscribers.*, billing_information.* FROM subscribers JOIN billing_information ON subscribers.subscriber_id = billing_information.subscriber_id WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY activation_date DESC;
SELECT subscription_plans.*, subscribers.activation_date FROM subscription_plans JOIN subscribers ON subscription_plans.id = subscribers.plan_id WHERE name LIKE 'Pro%' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT subscribers.subscriber_id, COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM subscribers JOIN communication_history ON subscribers.subscriber_id = communication_history.subscriber_id GROUP BY subscribers.subscriber_id HAVING total_communications > 5;
SELECT communication_id, subscriber_id FROM communication_history WHERE message IS NOT NULL ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM SubscriberAccounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name, email FROM SubscriberAccounts WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, price FROM SatelliteCommunicationPlans ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM SubscriptionHistory WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_id, SUM(data_usage) AS total_data_usage FROM SatelliteCommunicationUsage GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM SubscriberAccounts WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT plan_name, price FROM SatelliteCommunicationPlans WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT account_name, email, phone_number FROM SubscriberAccounts WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT plan_name, count(*) AS total_subscriptions FROM SatelliteCommunicationPlans INNER JOIN SubscriptionHistory ON SatelliteCommunicationPlans.plan_id = SubscriptionHistory.plan_id GROUP BY plan_name;

SELECT account_name, SUM(data_usage) AS total_data_usage FROM SubscriberAccounts INNER JOIN SatelliteCommunicationUsage ON SubscriberAccounts.account_id = SatelliteCommunicationUsage.account_id GROUP BY account_name HAVING SUM(data_usage) > 500.00 ORDER BY total_data_usage DESC;
